Transcription for 2143771

I will not sit still and let the past repeat itself. Not for my grandchildren, not for
anybody's grandchildren. I will do all I can for whatever life God gives me, for whatever
years I've got left, to teach as many children as I can. Because I now have the opportunity
to get to children. Something I've wanted to do for years. I've only been able to talk
about this for ten years. But now I can get to the children because I am the past. They
have the future. And you must teach the future. You must teach about, you must teach the future
to the, about the past so that the past must never repeat itself. Other people must not
go through what I've gone through and what hundreds and thousands like me have gone through.
Because everybody I know in the Kindertrans, they've all got a difference at all.
